# AbstractLookAround

**Class**

An abstract class that provides a common interface for Look Around views.

## Declaration

```swift
abstract class AbstractLookAround extends EventTarget
```

## Discussion

You can’t initialize an abstract class; use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/LookAround] or [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/LookAroundPreview] to create a Look Around view.

## Static properties

- **ReadyStates**: A static property that allows you to access the Look Around ready-state enumeration.

## Instance Properties

- **element**: A property that represents the Look Around view’s containing Document Object Model (DOM) element.
- **isNavigationEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can navigate inside the Look Around view.
- **isScrollEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.
- **isZoomEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can zoom the Look Around view.
- **openDialog**: Opens the Look Around view in a dialog.
- **padding**: The padding options for the Look Around view.
- **readyState**: A value that represents the loading state of the Look Around object.
- **scene**: The Look Around scene the framework is displaying.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view shows points of interest (POIs).
- **showsRoadLabels**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Look Around view shows road labels.

## Instance Methods

- **destroy()**: Releases the Look Around view and its resources from memory.

## Exploring at street level

- **LookAround**: A view that allows someone to see a street level view of a place.
- **LookAroundOptions**: Options for initializing a LookAround view.
- **LookAroundPreview**: A class that renders a preview of a Look Around view.
- **LookAroundPreviewOptions**: Options for initializing a LookAroundPreview object.
- **LookAroundScene**: Object that represents the current location of the view.
- **CommonLookAroundOptions**: Options that control the behavior of Look Around views.
- **lookAroundViews**: A list of all the Look Around objects that are currently active on a page.

## Inherited By

- LookAround
- LookAroundPreview
